name: DementiaTaskTracker
0:
”Alexa, open dementia task tracker”
”Alexa, start dementia task tracker”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: dementia task tracker
des: This basic task list is designed to assist care partners of people diagnosed with dementia to be organized throughout their day. It should not replace any medical guidance recommended by medical professionals. The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment, or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
